data.text: Don't be. Airplanes are equipped with lightning protection equipment, and modern airplanes can withstand lightning strikes that will not cause damage to airplane body.
Inject life into airplanes with intelligence to accomplish each take-off and landing.✈️ https://t.co/83nm3kYNUS

With the easing of the epidemic in China, CEAir has steadily resumed flights and launched products to boost domestic aviation industry. Over 250,000 people have used "fly at will" package on weekend so far, and the number will reach 2.5 million passengers by the year-end. https://t.co/zQ6kIGF73E

data.text: When unaccompanied children take the flights, our flight attendants always accompany them to play games, bringing them a more enjoyable flying time. This time, the flight attendants and the children played origami together. Can you recognize these little animals? https://t.co/fks6fkO06a

data.text: Today, we give you: Shanghai World Expo-themed airplane NO.1. In 2006, CEAir became the first partner of Shanghai World Expo, spraying the @Airbus A340-600 with the elements of the Expo and CEAir while spreading the theme of city and life. Do you remember the slogan of this Expo? https://t.co/uYjyr4wv2C

The spraying of airplane is getting cooler, different themes bring you a different flying experience. From this week, we would like to introduce you a painted CEAir airplane every week according to the launch time and to take you to appreciate the colorful flying culture.

data.text: There was no evidence that electronic equipment could cause the airplane to malfunction or even crash. Aviation experts also believe that modern communication technology is very safe and reliable. CEAir's Wi-Fi fleet allows passengers to use smartphones throughout the flight.
Are you worried about what if airplane is struck by lightning?🤨 https://t.co/5nkkBkU4TF

In #CEAir, women's power is indispensable. In early July, a model flying group composed of 11 female pilots was officially established in CEAir Yunan branch. Their rigor, agility and professionalism will inject new vitality into the whole flying team. #girlpower https://t.co/GsHLfPqkX8

Earlier, CEAir' subsidiary OTT Airlines has received the first China-developed ARJ21-700 airplane. The manufacturing of the airplane is also involved with experienced airplane maintenance engineers from CEAir. Their scrupulousness in every detail ensures the quality and design.👍 https://t.co/Zl5RdHUem2

Remember the charity sales activity? CEAir has used the proceeds from this activity to buy school supplies and daily necessities for deaf-mute school kids. On July 8th, volunteers from CEAir came to the school with these gifts, hoping to help them grow up more happily. https://t.co/5low4BSRSI

data.text: Your safety is our priority. We have teamed up with @traveloneworld and @staralliance to highlight the current health and safety measures in place to ensure you can fly with us in confidence. #FlyWithConfidence  #CEAirSafeTravel @icao @IATA https://t.co/8fsRcqIhcw
There are rumors that the interference of electronic equipment will cause the airplane malfunction or even crash? Is this true? What do you think? https://t.co/U5JN1TFYz9

On July 7th, CEAir Northwest Branch held a charity sales activity. The goods were mainly donated by CEAir employees. CEAir will use all the proceeds from this activity to donate to deaf-mute school kids to buy new school supplies and daily necessities. https://t.co/ITZleWb4T1

data.text: China Eastern's fleet has B777 series, B787 series and B737 series. Passenger's safety is always our top concern. With HPEA filters, the air in the cabin is refreshed every 3 minutes.@BoeingAirplanes https://t.co/RlkGYwx5mv

The World Skills Competition is known as the Olympics in the global skills field. Geng Hongjian from CEAir was admitted to Shanghai training team for the airplane maintenance project of the event and is expected to represent Shanghai in the national competition. https://t.co/MUYIBLZADd

CEAir CIIE-themed airplane is painted with the mascot panda "Jin Bao", "four-leaf clover" element of National Exhibition and Convention Center as well as @ciieonline CIIE logo on the body, achieving a perfect integration of the CIIE's elements and airplane aesthetics. https://t.co/urYnx6L2aP

data.text:
Tribute to Master #EnnioMorricone! Thank you for the days we have you and for the future we still hear you.
This summer, CEAir invites passengers to relive the classic film "The Legend of 1900" in the aerial theater.
#EnnioMorriconeRIP https://t.co/fICb1UC0Gq

In a shorter time, CEAir would like to transport as much cargo as possible to the people in need. By transforming passenger planes into cargo planes, CEAir has freight volume been enhanced and the time people wait shortened. Do you want to know how CEAir transform the airplane? https://t.co/UzNUiHY4Dw

On long-distance air travel, a pair of comfortable cabin slippers will accompany you to spend a relaxing time. CEAir cabin slippers are made of comfortable and recyclable materials. We encourage you to take it with you when you get off the plane to reduce waste. https://t.co/JaSp84cxIb

data.text: CEAir continues to expand the scope of paperless application with information technology like 5G network and has realized paperless boarding, electronic luggage tags and other services. The "paperless fleet" saves nearly 1,000 tons of aviation fuel every year. https://t.co/HfgXIOYJ22

On July 2, the world's first airplane painted with patterns of China International Import Expo launched by CEAir and CIIE is unveiled. This is also the first CEAir's painted B777 airplane. Do you know what type of airplane it is and why it has a panda pattern? https://t.co/9WEPQKgQ5I

data.text: By introducing new generation of airplanes, CEAir has comprehensively improved the fuel efficiency of the entire fleet. In 2018, A350-900 and B787-9 models introduced by CEAir have brought lighter structure and greater fuel efficiency.@Airbus @Boeing https://t.co/7oYppYGJi9

The pilot is turning off auxiliary power unit. APU provides power and air source for airplanes on the ground and consumes a lot of power. Using bridge to power airplanes instead of APU has become a solution to cut emission. https://t.co/dL6zV0Q814

Under the promotion of CEAir, over 1,000 fuel vehicles are being replaced by new energy vehicles. Through these "oil-to-electricity" vehicles, 2 million liters of fuel can be saved throughout the year, effectively reducing carbon emissions. https://t.co/VgGMxsS0gG
RT @JetPhotos: The first ARJ21 for China Eastern Airlines subsidiary OTT Airlines in Shanghai. https://t.co/Thx0RedDyR © liang TR https://t…

On June 28th, CEAir' subsidiary OTT Airlines has received the first China-developed ARJ21-700 airplane.With the support of CEAir, OTT Airlines will fully demonstrate the safety quality and advanced design of ARJ21 in operation, bringing passengers a comfortable flight experience. https://t.co/2jJxWqd8v8

data.text: During the Dragon Boat Festival, CEAir has prepared special meals for passengers, including salted pork zongzi, sweet red date zongzi, shaomai, dumplings, etc. There are so many, which one do you want to eat the most?😜 https://t.co/flsHmkmrbH

Smoking is prohibited in any corner of the plane, but airlines are concerned that some passengers cannot bear the long journey to smoke in the toilet and then discard cigarette butts in corners, which may cause fire. So, airlines keep the ashtray to eliminate hidden risk.

Today is the Dragon Boat Festival, eating zongzi is one of the festival activities. Crystal zongzi is a special kind of zongzi. Want to know how to make it? The chef of CEAir specially filmed the video for our followers! 😜 https://t.co/sVpzRMmqLu

data.text: Min Yuzhen is the deputy manager of CEAir Korea Call Center. During the epidemic, she needed to handle some work timely, which made her sometimes unable to cook for her daughter. But her understanding daughter prepared meals for her. This minor move makes her very touched. https://t.co/RCjQN1f23u

Recently, CEAir Yunnan Company has officially launched the luggage visualization system. Passengers can see the whole luggage transportation process, which also facilitates the staff to do information feedback in advance and improve efficiency. 👍 https://t.co/nvxe2UMo3A

June is a big month!
CEAir declared to cooperate with IPORT to build Xiamen an international aviation hub.
CEAir signed a deal with Henan Province to make Zhengzhou an aviation logistics hub.
CEAir announced to found a new international airline company with partners in Hainan. https://t.co/VPY2JjBPQ5

data.text:
Passenger safety is the priority of CEA, we provide 9 measures:
1. HEPA (High Efficiency Particulate Air filter) 
2. Cabin Disinfection
3. Vehicles Disinfection
4. PPE kit
5. Online Health Declaration System 
6. Air Medical Expert
7. Edainty Meal
8. Avoid reuse
9. Masks required https://t.co/dBYnOzAmkB

On June 11,CEAir's "passenger to cargo" flight took off from Zhejiang, China loaded with over 30 tons of medical supplies to Frankfurt, Germany. This was the first "passenger to cargo" flight carried out by CEAir in Zhejiang. https://t.co/zOVbhDdjYR
We are always ready to ROAR！ https://t.co/sifpL1JSDK

👉Warm reminder: CEAir will resume flights between Wuhan and Daxing airport from June 11. While the epidemic prevention and control is fully taken, CEAir will increase the flights from Wuhan to other major cities including Shanghai, Chengdu, Kunming. https://t.co/V3kogsjZCu

Here is the answer. The shape of the portholes is designed for the safety of passengers. In flight, the high pressure in the cabin acts on the portholes, and the oval shape has better stability than other shapes.

The third China International Import Expo will be held in Shanghai from November 5 to 10, 2020. As the partner, CEAir will unveil the world's first air plane with colorful body "Expo" coating. In the future, it will fly to the world through CEAir's global route network. https://t.co/0BR3FGJ25W

Sun Yunhui is an employee of CEAir Toronto Station. During the epidemic, she remained firmly on her post, took on multiple missions, participated in guaranteeing a total of 1,510 tons of goods sent from China to Toronto, of which 1,200 tons were medical supplies. https://t.co/Qita0aVjeo

data.text: CEAir flight recently welcomed a special "passenger", a gentle guide dog, Ai Wei. Its eyes are full of loyalty and care for his owner. During boarding, Ai Wei carefully guided its owner to the seat, and then stayed quietly beside. Are you attracted by its cute little eyes? https://t.co/FEAYjGLmdc
Have you ever questioned why portholes shape on airliners is not triangle or square? 🤔 https://t.co/lbnNYfFLlK

"Hello everyone, I’m Dongdong. I can help answer enquiries if you need my help." During the epidemic, CEAir provides non-contact services as always to ensure the health of people whether it is in the airport, the lounge, or the service hall. https://t.co/0nB3ID3fkj

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
❤️We are a community with a shared future.
🤝Friendship is always a sweet responsibility.
💪To shoulder social responsibility is CEAir's born duty.
✈️CEAir expects to bridge Sri Lanka and China soon at the sky. https://t.co/i23sCApVVE

#WeAreTheWorld The employees of CEAir from all over the world use different instruments and sing the same song to express their expectations for the world after the epidemic. CEAir looks forward to meeting you in the air again. https://t.co/llB2jeRRrl
Most modern airplanes are started automatically, there is no need to pull the wrench or press the button to operate, but if necessary, it can still be started manually. https://t.co/9meqUQugbp

On May 28, a CEAir all-cargo aircraft touched down Zhengzhou, China with cherries flew from L.A. The first regular cargo flight opened by CEAir from China to the Western Hemisphere was successfully launched. Zhengzhou is used as the main operating base with 3 flights per week. https://t.co/zWANx9Xd1g

data.text: CEAir temperature checking group shines like a diamond no matter at lunch time torched by burning sun or surrounded by darkness at midnight. During the epidemic, whenever passengers touch down safe and sound, they would cheer up like kids. https://t.co/0lkfyXFtsL

CEAir Manila sales manager Allan Rillera sang with his daughter at home, expressing their expectation of life after the epidemic. With the ease of situation in Manila, the flight between Manila and Shanghai is resumed; CEAir looks forward to sliding with you again. #WeAreTheWorld https://t.co/WD3Vm3mhNO

Are you scared when you push FLUSH button in the plane toilet room? Will you be sucked in the toilet with waste? LOL, this certainly will not happen even the sound of the flush is loud and aggressive. Actually, the vacuum power only can flush away waste. So, don't worry. https://t.co/ESdk6kAARq
What is the most beautiful scenery you have ever seen?✈️ https://t.co/fIt1Jql7i2

Qiang Zhengli, manager at CEAir Moscow station. Earlier, he encountered his pilot friend Yang Yong. Due to the epidemic, they had no choice to talk about the old days but to make a picture in the bridge only. However, this is their precious fighting epidemic memory.#WeAreTheWorld https://t.co/XaLjSslAcO

data.text: Angels in white have been saving lives during the epidemic, now CEAir has the honor to return the favor. Earlier, a donated living liver boarded the flight flying to Shanghai with the cooperation of CEAir, which saved the life of a hero who fought the epidemic in Wuhan. https://t.co/2O7bAKbX3b

#CEAirRobot
Hi, I am a noncontact serving trolley robot working in the Shanghai Pudong CEAir`s VIP lounge. During the special time, I am laden with food, snacks, beverage, offering point-to-point service to reduce contacts between people for the sake of hygiene and safety. https://t.co/OYWp3CM9Td

Of course not!
Vacuum drain system is adopted inside modern planes. Waste is vacuumed into a storage box in the belly of plane and then processed with chemical agent. The waste is collected by ground service staff when plane touches down instead of being sprayed in the air. https://t.co/R3pIOUfkiK

Fly for you day & night! May 20, 7: 04 AM, CEAir flight MU212 fly from Manila with 237 passengers, this marked CEAir as the first airline in China to resume flights during morning curfew. In June, CEAir will perform flights between Shanghai and Manila every Tuesday and Wednesday. https://t.co/4mgIVUDQDq

110 students studying in Zhejiang province were stranded back in Yunnan because of the epidemic. It's challenging to bring them all back to their school at once. Noting this, comprehensive arrangements were made by CEAir to make sure they reach their destinations safe and sound. https://t.co/7vPMPY5q1a

I'm Cao Yong, CEAir`s station manager in Seoul. Passengers` health and safety is of paramount importance to us. Faced with the epidemic, not any one of employees in the station complained or held back, I am very touched by the courage and responsibility they showed.#WeAreTheWorld https://t.co/1vyHCLxOIx

data.text: People's health and safety are always our top concern. Within our capacity, we will continue to assist the transportation and dedicate our strength to fight against the epidemic. We are always on the way. https://t.co/El5qJ4mBsv

I used to be jealous of my mum because of her job. After growing up, I follow my mum`s footsteps and become a #CEAir flight attendant. What you want to be during your childhood. Please share with everyone. https://t.co/ryjgURXuT7

#CEAirRobot
Hi, guys, I am CEAir`s disinfecting robot. I am only allowed to work inside CEAir area since I am still an intern. My job is to disinfect constantly by spraying harmless disinfectant to create a healthy and safe working environment for CEAir employees. https://t.co/mNcr2wdzx4
Photo credit:@KonohaEmi https://t.co/WfcxQUoBUf

On May 17, a CEAir “passenger to cargo” A330-200 wide body plane took off from Shenzhen airport to Los Angeles with nearly 30 tons of anti-epidemic supplies, which marked CEAir`s official launch of the freight route between the 2 cities. https://t.co/XRs2sKkeIg

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: For the People
entity.description: The United States District Court for the Southern District of New York - also known as the Mother Court - is the oldest district court in the nation, and the setting for the newest drama from the minds of Shonda Rhimes and Betsy Beers. Focusing on the lives and careers of the brand-new lawyers working for both the defence and the prosecution and handling some of the most high-profile and high-stakes federal cases in the country, `For the People' follows the talented professionals as their lives intersect both in and out of the courtroom.

data.text: CEAir flight attendant Giada had to stay at home during the epidemic. But she kept learning & working out in order to fly back sky. She actively made her contribution for the community she lives in including raising money and purchasing food for the people in need. #wearetheworld https://t.co/u3D4ueOPt8

On May 15, a CEAir "passenger to cargo" route from Kunming to San Francisco was successfully launched. This international route is planned to perform 1 to 2 round-trip flights per week, which will help the recovery and stability of the global industrial chain. https://t.co/kYcKG6hmH8

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Huang Song is a CEAir pilot. During the epidemic, when his charter flight landed once, he opened the window of the cockpit, held up the boards of " Angel come home" and " Return of the Heroes" to express his deep gratitude to the medical staff who saved Hubei. https://t.co/89hVUiCkt7

#CEAir recently performed the MU7016 "Madrid-Nanjing" temporary charter flight. 183 international students and compatriots returned home from Spain on this flight. In this mission, CEAir also assisted in the confirmation of the passenger list and ticket purchase matters. https://t.co/QihVwqGCiI

data.text: As one of China's three major airlines, CEAir is also a member of @SkyTeam. CEAir 's route network reaches 175 countries and 1,150 destinations worldwide. In the future, we will cover more areas and try our best to meet your business and travel needs. https://t.co/GM6o7KFxP7

data.text: On May 7, Yangon Sales Department of CEAir donated medical masks to Myanmar Civil Aviation Administration, Yangon Airport Immigration Bureau to support local epidemic prevention. This support writes a new chapter for the friendship between the two countries. https://t.co/OupPSOkoWa

data.text: On this Mother's Day, CEAir flight attendant Qin Zheng's daughter sent her blessings: “Mom, you still have to work during the epidemic, I hope you take good care of yourself. More importantly, I wish you always be healthy, young and beautiful!” https://t.co/MbWhNurs6a

data.text: In your eyes, home is a place, in mom's eyes, home is a time with you. In this special period, home is the safest place for us. The arrival of Mother's Day brings warmth to this period. What kind of surprise did you prepare for mom? Share it in the comments. https://t.co/xbE0ZKomNm

data.text: CEAir's "Kitchen Exploration" program launched in April has improved the VIP room catering in terms of service, characteristic meal and cultural connotation. Now, the robot "Dongdong" has also entered the VIP room to provide you with a different service experience. https://t.co/jE5fqQaPNR
It is a pleasure to work with our partner @YutongGlobal to turn the world to a better direction. https://t.co/WYsCTqgrJJ
Photo credit：@AirJapanNH803 https://t.co/j6yHYNffzF

data.text: "In 30 years, I only do one thing and strive to make it the best." Gu Mingming has longed for the blue sky since childhood, and became one of the first group of flight theory instructors of CEAir in 1987. Over 3 decades of teaching career, he has taught thousands of pilots. https://t.co/TOEH0xaX58

On May 6, a CEAir A330 "passenger to cargo" plane loaded with medical supplies touched down in Paris from Beijing. This long-planned "Beijing-Paris" direct route was initiated in this mode during this special period. https://t.co/g67t3vgOmL

data.text: As the new season begins, CEAir will perform 1832 flights daily. Meanwhile, comprehensive ground services are resumed, including self-service check-in for most domestic routes and hot meals served in the VIP lounge. https://t.co/gJGRuvZDpd

On May 3, 28 flights were performed, setting a new high for single-day flights. Compared with the initial stage of resuming production and work, the number of flights operated by CEAir Wuhan company has gradually increased, and the Wuhan aviation market is rapidly recovering. https://t.co/am526ZKKSt

data.text: On April 29, in poverty alleviation counties  Cangyuan and Shuangjiang, several CEAir people promoted local specialties like honey, tea to customers of the “MU Select” store through live stream, helping local people increase their income and improve their lives. https://t.co/nNjSD8PvJf

In 2019, CEAir has over 700 aircrafts, of which the Airbus fleet is the largest in Asia and second in the world. The fleet including 20 B777 series, 10 B787 series, 7 A350 series, 56 A330 series, 328 A320 series, 302 B737 series, and 11 business jets. https://t.co/aHc5EMtFRb

data.text: 29 years ago, my dad wore his uniform and hugged 1-year old me. Time flies, I also enter CEAir and become a colleague of him. And I have the opportunity to have witnessed the change of CEAir uniform. Now, we are still working at CEAir that accompanies our family growth. https://t.co/dxv5rvBTQO

CEAir employee Hedie has work for the company for 1 decade. Earlier, she and other volunteers joined the team to produce masks because of protective supplies shortage. Every piece of mask she produces with heart and effort is for winning this silent battle. https://t.co/xndsJng3pJ

data.text: The longest winter vacation in history will be over! Students, do you miss your university? On Aril 24, CEAir flight MU967 and MU7085 with 138 Qinghai University students landed at Xining Caojiabao International Airport from Hubei Province and Shandong Province. https://t.co/NMEzftyCLg

Chengdu Tianfu International Airport will be the largest civil transport one in 2021. Chengdu will have 2 airports after Beijing and Shanghai. As a base airline, CEAir will cooperate to build the city a transportation hub in western China and “Silk Road in the Air” for the world. https://t.co/24SKMuMh7t

data.text: Win speedy success! On April 25, CEAir flight MU705 landed in Dubai with over 10 tons of supplies from Xi`an, this is the first international freight charter by Northwest branch during the special period. To complete the mission, CEAir sent an A330-300 plane and 9 cabin crew. https://t.co/MTPrGo9zEd

Hu Yongjin is a " cardiologist " of CEAir. He has been working in engine endoscope inspection and performance monitoring for more than 20 years. Over the years, his scrupulousness and craftsmanship has kept ZERO record of mistake. https://t.co/w1acrekVja
